search_results.snippet:
Sara Heard: a housewife from Brooklyn, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings 
total $70,400). First Jeopardy .... Jimmy reports from backstage at the 
Metropolitan Opera in New York. ... Backstage at the Met, you can find sets for 
operas by Verdi, Mozart & Puccini, who begins this opera in a Latin quarter garret 
"O, Mimi, tu pi.
search_results.title: jeopardy/3624_Qs.txt at master  jedoublen/jeopardy  GitHub

question: (Jimmy reports from backstage at the Metropolitan Opera in New York.)  Backstage at the Met, you can find sets for operas by Verdi, Mozart & Puccini, who begins this opera in a Latin quarter garret"O, Mimi, tu pi..."
